meanings.definition: A document sent by fax machine.
meanings.sent1: I received the contract through fax.
meanings.sent2: Please send me the form via fax.
meanings.sent3: The fax arrived just in time for the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The fax brought news of the upcoming event.
meanings.sent5: The fax of the report was clear and easy to read.

meanings.definition: To send a document by fax.
meanings.sent1: Can you fax the papers to the office?
meanings.sent2: I will fax the information to you shortly.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fax the document upside down by mistake.
meanings.sent4: She faxed her resignation, signaling a new beginning.
meanings.sent5: Remember to fax the contract before the deadline.

meanings.definition: A machine used to send and receive faxes.
meanings.sent1: The fax is located in the corner of the office.
meanings.sent2: Our new fax is faster than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The fax machine beeped loudly when receiving a fax.
meanings.sent4: The fax hummed with activity during peak hours.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the fax makes it easy to use.
